resume.skillmessage: Full Stack JavaScript Web Developer, with a natural sciences background.

education.description: Rigorous 12-week Coding Boot Camp that focused on the MERN stack.
Studied abroad in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia, July 2014 – December 2014, and also was the scholarship chair of Theta Chi Fraternity, August 2013 – December 2013.
